name: PowerBI.Import
description: Imports a file to a workspace.
author: bguidinger

inputs.name: Group
inputs.label: Workspace
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify either the ID or the Name of the workspace.  If not specified, your personal workspace will be used.

inputs.name: Path
inputs.label: Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the file or folder to import.

inputs.name: ConnectionStrings
inputs.label: Connection Strings
inputs.helpMarkDown: Connection strings to replace in .rdl files. The keys are the names of the data sources.  The values are the connection strings.
